mapper.sql: ID, RANK, SYS_ITEM_ID, UNIT, UNIT_TYPE, IS_DELETE, IS_ENABLE, PAY_TYPE, COST
tb.ID, tb.RANK, tb.SYS_ITEM_ID, tb.UNIT, tb.UNIT_TYPE, tb.IS_DELETE, tb.IS_ENABLE, tb.PAY_TYPE, tb.COST
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_TEAM_BUFF tb,SYS_ITEM sitem where tb.IS_DELETE = 0 and tb.SYS_ITEM_ID= sitem.ID
and ( tb.SYS_ITEM_ID like '${searchValue}%' or sitem.DISPLAY_NAME like '%${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert:
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
insert into SYS_TEAM_BUFF
ID,
RANK,
SYS_ITEM_ID,
UNIT,
UNIT_TYPE,
IS_DELETE,
IS_ENABLE,
PAY_TYPE,
COST,

mapper.update:
update SYS_TEAM_BUFF
RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SYS_ITEM_ID = #{sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
IS_ENABLE = #{isEnable,jdbcType=BIT},
PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
COST = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_TEAM_BUFF set RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYS_ITEM_ID = #{sysItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, IS_ENABLE = #{isEnable,jdbcType=BIT}, PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, COST = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
